verses.verse: Behold, <WG1492> what manner<WG4217> of love<WG26> the<WG3588> Father<WG3962> hath bestowed<WG1325> upon us,<WG2254> that<WG2443> we should be called<WG2564> the sons<WG5043> of God:<WG2316> therefore<WG1223> <WG5124> the<WG3588> world<WG2889> knoweth<WG1097> us<WG2248> not,<WG3756> because<WG3754> it knew<WG1097> him<WG846> not.<WG3756>

Beloved, <WG27> now<WG3568> are<WG2070> we the sons<WG5043> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> it doth not yet<WG3768> appear<WG5319> what<WG5101> we shall be:<WG2071> but<WG1161> we know<WG1492> that,<WG3754> when<WG1437> he shall appear,<WG5319> we shall be<WG2071> like<WG3664> him;<WG846> for<WG3754> we shall see<WG3700> him<WG846> as<WG2531> he is.<WG2076>
And <WG2532> every man<WG3956> that hath<WG2192> this<WG5026> hope<WG1680> in<WG1909> him<WG846> purifieth<WG48> himself,<WG1438> even as<WG2531> he<WG1565> is<WG2076> pure.<WG53>
Whosoever <WG3956> committeth<WG4160> sin<WG266> transgresseth also the law:<WG4160> <WG2532> <WG458> for<WG2532> sin<WG266> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> transgression of the law.<WG458>
And <WG2532> ye know<WG1492> that<WG3754> he<WG1565> was manifested<WG5319> to<WG2443> take away<WG142> our<WG2257> sins;<WG266> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> him<WG846> is<WG2076> no<WG3756> sin.<WG266>

Whosoever <WG3956> abideth<WG3306> in<WG1722> him<WG846> sinneth<WG264> not:<WG3756> whosoever<WG3956> sinneth<WG264> hath not<WG3756> seen<WG3708> him,<WG846> neither<WG3761> known<WG1097> him.<WG846>

Little children,<WG5040> let no man<WG3367> deceive<WG4105> you:<WG5209> he that doeth<WG4160> righteousness<WG1343> is<WG2076> righteous,<WG1342> even as<WG2531> he<WG1565> is<WG2076> righteous.<WG1342>

He that committeth<WG4160> sin<WG266> is<WG2076> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> devil;<WG1228> for<WG3754> the<WG3588> devil<WG1228> sinneth<WG264> from<WG575> the beginning.<WG746> For<WG1519> this purpose<WG5124> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316> was manifested,<WG5319> that<WG2443> he might destroy<WG3089> the<WG3588> works<WG2041> of the<WG3588> devil.<WG1228>

Whosoever <WG3956> is born<WG1080> of<WG1537> God<WG2316> doth not<WG3756> commit<WG4160> sin;<WG266> for<WG3754> his<WG848> seed<WG4690> remaineth<WG3306> in<WG1722> him:<WG846> and<WG2532> he cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> sin,<WG264> because<WG3754> he is born<WG1080> of<WG1537> God.<WG2316>

In <WG1722> this<WG5129> the<WG3588> children<WG5043> of God<WG2316> are<WG2076> manifest,<WG5318> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> children<WG5043> of the<WG3588> devil:<WG1228> whosoever<WG3956> doeth<WG4160> not<WG3361> righteousness<WG1343> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> God,<WG2316> neither<WG2532> he that loveth<WG25> not<WG3361> his<WG848> brother.<WG80>
For <WG3754> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> message<WG31> that<WG3739> ye heard<WG191> from<WG575> the beginning,<WG746> that<WG2443> we should love<WG25> one another.<WG240>

Not <WG3756> as<WG2531> Cain,<WG2535> who was<WG2258> of<WG1537> that wicked one,<WG4190> and<WG2532> slew<WG4969> his<WG848> brother.<WG80> And<WG2532> wherefore<WG5484> <WG5101> slew<WG4969> he him?<WG846> Because<WG3754> his own<WG848> works<WG2041> were<WG2258> evil,<WG4190> and<WG1161> his<WG848> brother's<WG80> righteous.<WG1342>
Marvel <WG2296> not,<WG3361> my<WG3450> brethren,<WG80> if<WG1487> the<WG3588> world<WG2889> hate<WG3404> you.<WG5209>

We <WG2249> know<WG1492> that<WG3754> we have passed<WG3327> from<WG1537> death<WG2288> unto<WG1519> life,<WG2222> because<WG3754> we love<WG25> the<WG3588> brethren.<WG80> He that loveth<WG25> not<WG3361> his brother<WG80> abideth<WG3306> in<WG1722> death.<WG2288>

Whosoever <WG3956> hateth<WG3404> his<WG848> brother<WG80> is<WG2076> a murderer:<WG443> and<WG2532> ye know<WG1492> that<WG3754> no<WG3956> <WG3756> murderer<WG443> hath<WG2192> eternal<WG166> life<WG2222> abiding<WG3306> in<WG1722> him.<WG846>

Hereby <WG1722> <WG5129> perceive<WG1097> we the<WG3588> love<WG26> of God,<WG2316> because<WG3754> he<WG1565> laid down<WG5087> his<WG848> life<WG5590> for<WG5228> us:<WG2257> and<WG2532> we<WG2249> ought<WG3784> to lay down<WG5087> our lives<WG5590> for<WG5228> the<WG3588> brethren.<WG80>

But <WG1161> whoso<WG3739> <WG302> hath<WG2192> this world's<WG2889> good,<WG979> and<WG2532> seeth<WG2334> his<WG848> brother<WG80> have<WG2192> need,<WG5532> and<WG2532> shutteth up<WG2808> his<WG848> bowels<WG4698> of compassion from<WG575> him,<WG846> how<WG4459> dwelleth<WG3306> the<WG3588> love<WG26> of God<WG2316> in<WG1722> him?<WG846>
My <WG3450> little children,<WG5040> let us not<WG3361> love<WG25> in word,<WG3056> neither<WG3366> in tongue;<WG1100> but<WG235> in deed<WG2041> and<WG2532> in truth.<WG225>

And <WG2532> hereby<WG1722> <WG5129> we know<WG1097> that<WG3754> we are<WG2070> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> truth,<WG225> and<WG2532> shall assure<WG3982> our<WG2257> hearts<WG2588> before<WG1715> him.<WG846>
For <WG3754> if<WG1437> our<WG2257> heart<WG2588> condemn<WG2607> us,<WG3754> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> greater<WG3187> than our<WG2257> heart,<WG2588> and<WG2532> knoweth<WG1097> all things.<WG3956>
Beloved, <WG27> if<WG1437> our<WG2257> heart<WG2588> condemn<WG2607> us<WG2257> not,<WG3361> then have<WG2192> we confidence<WG3954> toward<WG4314> God.<WG2316>

And <WG2532> whatsoever<WG3739> <WG1437> we ask,<WG154> we receive<WG2983> of<WG3844> him,<WG846> because<WG3754> we keep<WG5083> his<WG848> commandments,<WG1785> and<WG2532> do<WG4160> those things that are pleasing<WG701> in his sight.<WG1799> <WG846>

And <WG2532> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> his<WG848> commandment,<WG1785> That<WG2443> we should believe<WG4100> on the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of his<WG848> Son<WG5207> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> and<WG2532> love<WG25> one another,<WG240> as<WG2531> he gave<WG1325> us<WG2254> commandment.<WG1785>

And <WG2532> he that keepeth<WG5083> his<WG848> commandments<WG1785> dwelleth<WG3306> in<WG1722> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> he<WG846> in<WG1722> him.<WG846> And<WG2532> hereby<WG1722> <WG5129> we know<WG1097> that<WG3754> he abideth<WG3306> in<WG1722> us,<WG2254> by<WG1537> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> which<WG3739> he hath given<WG1325> us.<WG2254>
